channel.title: Gambling on Everyday Theory
channel.description: Recent content in Gambling on Everyday Theory

item.title: Architecture as Bets
item.description: Chess has a long history of structured openings. You have a set of steps that put you in a known position, with known strengths and weaknesses, several moves in to the game. From the opening, you have several options to branch out from. There is also a common nomenclature. If I say, “Queen’s Gambit”… honestly most people will think of the Netflix series. In reality, the term does refer to an actual opening with particular piece positions that a chess expert should be able to visualize.
